section.name: Welcome to Mod4j
section.p: Mod4j is a project that focuses on Model Driven Software Development. It's goal is to improve the productivity of Java software development by using Domain Specific Languages.

li.a: What are the features of Mod4j?
Where do I get help with Mod4j?

ol.li: Make sure you've installed Java JDK version 5 (1.5_10 or greater). You can download one from the Sun download site.

Install Eclipse with modeling plug-ins. To minimize time spending on version en dependency conflicts we already have a version waiting for you to download. This version based on Eclipse Europa 3.3.2, OAW 4.2, EMF 2.3.1 and has some convenient plug-ins (like Subclipse). You can download it from our project share here
